subject: Shipment Problem
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered the SIMSONN Pro X Ultra Racing Simulator 3 pedal set+baseplate
and 3 vam pro haptic motors off of amazon. During the shipping process, the
items were returned to you guys. What would happen now? Would you guys
reship the items? I have contacted you guys off of the amazon website too.
I was really hoping the pedals would come soon, as I am building my first
sim racing setup.

My order: #702-8482238-7209020 on Amazon.ca.

Best regards,

Ben
